Job Posting: 177983 - Position: S26 Quality Analyst 177983 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/10/2026 09:00 AM Through UBC Science Co-op 02/03/2026 12:04 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Ledcor Corporation Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration 2026 - Summer S26 Quality Analyst 177983 Co-op Position Vancouver, BC Canada 8 or 12 months Salary Currency CAD Salary Job Description 22.0 per hour for 0 Major List The Co-op Quality Analyst is responsible for evaluating and testing business solutions to ensure proper functionality and experience. This individual will work closely with the Test Lead and team members to establish acceptance criteria, execute testing, and report defects to assess solution quality and effectiveness. The Co-op Quality Analyst provides Tier 1 support to end-users in addition to assisting with triage and supporting regular incident tickets submitted. Essential Responsibilities • Tests, analyzes, and assesses developed functionality, and contributes to refining backlog items while working alongside the development team and end-users. • Performs functional, system, integration, regression, end-to-end, user acceptance testing. • Prepares test data and test environment configuration. • Performs test planning collaboration, test script creation, deficiency documentation, and gap identification. • Provides Tier 1 support for end users, escalates as necessary. • Triages incoming demands and issues, towards work pipeline flow. • Identifies opportunities for continuous improvement towards team overall success. Documents processes, procedures, and functionality of solutions and configurations for end-user training and education. • Job Requirements • Completing a College, Trade or Technical Diploma/Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, UI / UX, Software Testing or related field. • Experience in software development or related technology industries is considered an asset • Experience in a customer facing, technical role is considered an asset • Beginner level experience educationally with testing and testing methodologies • Hands on experience with MS SQL Hands on experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSON & XML • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through UBC Science Co-op Cover Letter Required? Yes Address Cover Letter to Hiring Manager
